title: Aesthetic Instructional Design for Transformative Learning Experiences

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of learning theories and teaching experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening educational design competencies in social contexts for office/administrative professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the five principles of instructional design aesthetics and apply them to real educational contexts
Learners can implement 12 guidelines for designing immersive integrated learning experiences
Learners can concretely implement transformative learning experiences incorporating aesthetic elements in assessment projects
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
